abstract:
We use a data quality model to demonstrate that BCG vaccination is correlated with protection from death from COVID19. From a mechanistic perspective, BCG is well described to elicit its protective non-specific effects through the process of trained immunity. Therapeutically enhancing trained immunity may therefore be an important mechanism in protection from the lethal effects of COVID19
Competing Interest Statement
author: Simone J.C.F.M. Moorlag; Cameron M. Green; Stephanie Fanucchi; Leo A.B. Joosten; Ezio T. Fok; Jorge Dominguez-Andres; Yutaka Negishi; Musa M. Mhlanga; Mihai G. Netea
title: COVID-19: A model correlating BCG vaccination to protection from mortality implicates trained immunity
